content:
If you agree that all people/organisations deserve an equal chance to be displayed at the top of the Service Providers pages on B.org, we could use a review of these issues please:
https://github.com/backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org/issues/633
https://github.com/backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org/issues/690

Service Providers page only shows USA by default · Issue #633 · backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org
The Service Providers page is filtered by Country: United States by default. That seems a bit unfair. Can we make it 'Any' by default please?
Make the listing order on service providers pages random · Issue #690 · backdrop-ops/backdropcms.org
Please make the listing order on service providers pages such as https://backdropcms.org/services/data-migration, https://backdropcms.org/services/consulting, https://backdropcms.org/services/suppo...
